content: sorry for the basic question but I couldn't figure this out. I have a folder with a main file which lake build can compile. I want to write some auxillary things in another file called Template.lean, but I can't import it in the main file by "import Template". When I call lake build it says it says unknown package. How can I allow lean to import this local file?
Importing local files is currently not supported. You have to create a properly formatted project to import files from it.

The file being imported has to be referenced in a lean_lib from the lakefile for this to work
